https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5KqBMkg4y9Cezc2fRSnSCQpXUxF.jpg In a cave in the woods,all winter long, Bear sleeps in his cozy lair. Surprise guests stop by to warm up, brew tea and pop corn while Bear snores on.Cheerful rhymes will charm children as they wait for Bear's BIG reaction. Bear Snores On
